Home > 22 Oct 2010

Geomob October 2010 - Thank you!

Following a successful event yesterday, we would like to say big thank you to all Geomob October 2010 speakers and attendees.

If you have missed out - fear not! We have posted all presentations online so you can check four great talks from yesterday’s event.

PRESENTATIONS

Max Howell - GeoTweetDeck

Matt Watkins - Chromaroma: Ambient Gaming

Oliver O’Brien - Visualising Bike Share: From Boris Bikes to Bike Shares Across the World

Eugene Tsyrklevich - Parkopedia: building apps for non-geeks

KEEP IN TOUCH

Follow @geomob and Geomob Oct ‘10: Speakers list on Twitter.

Sign up on Lanyrd as “Attending” for our next event on 10th February 2011.

THANKS

Finally, a big thank you to our SPONSORS:

PROfounders Capital

Lokku Ltd

Cloudmade

and the UCL department of Civil, Environmental and Geomatic Engineering for hosting the event
